scripts.docker:build: yarn docker:clean && cd ../.. && docker build -t ghcr.io/wired-labs/host -f apps/host/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:clean: yarn docker:stop && docker rmi ghcr.io/wired-labs/host || true
scripts.docker:start: yarn docker:stop && docker run --rm -e RTC_MIN_PORT=20000 -e RTC_MAX_PORT=20020 -e MEDIASOUP_ANNOUNCED_IP=127.0.0.1 -p 4000:4000 -p 20000-20020:20000-20020/tcp -p 20000-20020:20000-20020/udp --name wired-host ghcr.io/wired-labs/host
